name: @sgmonda/streamfu
description: Functional programming utilities for working with streams in JS/TS

test.command: rm -Rf coverage && deno test --allow-all --coverage --ignore=examples/bun,examples/cloudflare-workers && deno task test:examples && deno coverage --exclude=src/system --exclude=examples

tasks.test:examples: deno task test:examples:node && deno task test:examples:bun && deno task test:examples:cloudflare-workers
tasks.test:examples:node: cd ./examples/node && npm test && npx -y yarn test && npx -y pnpm test
